metadata.title: Unable to monitor on QE for Capacitive Touch via E2/E2 Lite emulator

sections.content:
Question:
Unable to monitor on QE for Capacitive Touch via E2/E2 Lite emulator
Answer:
Please note that monitoring on QE for Capacitive Touch cannot be executed via the E2/E2 Lite emulator when the main system clock is set to a low frequency (less than 8 MHz).
Also, in case of RL78/G16, monitoring cannot be executed via 2/E2 Lite emulator, so please execute it using serial communication (UART).
Suitable Products
RL78/G23, RL78/G22, RL78/G16
